reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Queen Bed Frame is a robust and sturdy choice for those seeking durability. With an 18-inch height, it offers ample under-bed storage. The heavy-duty metal steel platform supports , eliminating the need for a box spring. Assembly is straightforward, making it easy to set up. While it provides reliable support, some users may find the design somewhat basic. In essence, it's a strong and practical bed frame for those prioritizing durability and simplicity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tall and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is much better than I expected. The parts were securely packaged and wrapped so that they did not get scuffed or damaged during shipment and it came with all of the hardware pieces and tools to successfully assemble the frame. The black powder coat finish has a satin look and will tie in well with most coordinating furniture. The instructions were moderately clear, but you can figure it out after looking them over a few times. Once you get the first couple of pieces together, they all seem to fall into place with ease. This frame is the perfect platform for a memory foam mattress because it is the correct height once the mattress is on it and you will not need a box spring to add extra height or support. Since the frame is so high, you can store good sized boxes underneath if you wanted, but remember there are support legs down the center of the frame. This frame is the ultimate for sturdiness and there is zero shimmy or shake once you put a memory foam mattress on top of it. It has an excellent support structure for the mattress and you will not get any sagging areas. The frame is relatively light for two people to maneuver without a mattress on top and you will probably want to take the weight of the mattress off of it if you move the bed frame around the room. I was expecting the rounded legs on all four corners of the bed frame, but they are only at the foot of the bed and the head of the frame has rectangular boxed legs. Nevertheless, the legs at the head of the bed also have rectangular slots cut into them which would allow for mounting a custom headboard if you so desired. Overall, I'm quite pleased with the quality of this bed frame and I love the height combined with the absolute stability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect High Queen Bed Frame
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together, which can't always be said for bed frames. The best part is having all the space underneath for more storage to declutter my closet a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is just as described. It's easy to put together and I love the height. I'm always needing more space for storage and this helped with aspect as well. My previous frame broke, a couple times.. this is very strong and sturdy. It hasn't made any noise or squeak and it supports our massive mattress very well. I assembled it inside the headboard/footboard set up and it fit perfectly. I can stack 2, sometimes 3, shoe boxes underneath. Very satisfied.
